Text:
Hi CurrentHD, My previous account was destroyed by some hacker from TPB, I continue using TPB with out any account, But I can not stop myself from creating a new account just for one purpose.
To salute you and congratulate you for you Superb upload. Thanks Gentleman. Thanks Again from the Deep inside my Heart. Regards and Love for You Current_HD Even If I don't know your name.
